attributes.action: Make Estate agents a propoerly regulated industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any Tom, Dick or Harriette can set themselves up as an estate agent with no real protection for the consumer plus customers being pressurised to see "tied" mortgage brokers

rejection.details:
An Order requiring estate agents in the UK who engage in residential estate agency work to belong to an approved redress scheme dealing with complaints about the buying and selling of residential property was laid in Parliament on 1 July 2008. It will come into force on 1 October 2008. Other changes to the Estate Agents Act 1979 will also come into force on 1 October 2008.

http://www.berr.gov.uk/consumers/fact-sheets/page38024.html
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
